statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPLocation)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP API Gateway Locations that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPLocation)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP API Gateway Locations to Project relationships that are out of date
